$schema.description: Optional schema URL or path to validate against; overrides auto selection when provided

last_updated.description: Timestamp the manifest was last updated, in UTC (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ)

pages.description: Global registry of pages. Keys are canonical wiki titles (e.g., 'Template:Microscope').

file.description: Repository-relative path under 'pages/' to the file that defines this page

description.description: Optional human-readable description of the page

packs.description: Registry of packs keyed by pack id

packRegistry.description: Mapping of pack id to pack metadata

description.description: Optional human-readable description of the pack

version.description: Semantic version for the pack (no pattern enforced here beyond being a string)

pages.description: List of page titles included in this pack; must exist in the global pages registry

depends_on.description: Pack ids this pack depends on; strings must be keys in the packs registry
